byline.contributor: Kristin Hussey reported from Bridgeport, and Marc Santora from New York.
byline.original: By KRISTIN HUSSEY and MARC SANTORA

abstract: Lawyers for Remington Arms Company and other defendants ask Connecticut Superior Court to dismiss suit brought by families of victims of 2012  Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting, who hope to hold gun manufacturers and dealers responsible for attack.
lead_paragraph: Families of victims in the Sandy Hook school shooting are arguing that the makers and distributors of assault weapons have negligently marketed weapons of war to civilians.

headline.main: Newtown Victims’ Families Look On as Gun Makers Ask Court to Dismiss Lawsuit
